SEARCH
Package wordle

Class MainMenuController

java.lang.Object
wordle.MainMenuController
public class MainMenuController extends Object
Controller class for the main menu of the Wordle game application. This class handles user interactions on the main menu, such as starting a new game, loading a game, accessing the how-to-play guide, logging in, viewing the scoreboard, and quitting the game.

  • Field Details

    • howToPlayButton

      public javafx.scene.control.Button howToPlayButton
      Button to display the "How to Play" instructions. Clicking this button shows the user a guide or tutorial on how to play.

    • logInButton

      public javafx.scene.control.Button logInButton
      Button for the user to log in to their account.

    • debugButton

      public javafx.scene.control.Button debugButton
      Button for the user to view debug mode

    • scoreboardButton

      public javafx.scene.control.Button scoreboardButton
      Button to view the scoreboard. Clicking this button displays the game's high scores and player rankings.

  • Method Details

    • loadPlayerClicked

      protected void loadPlayerClicked() throws IOException
      Handles the click event on the "Load Player" button. This method loads the load player view.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during loading the FXML file for the load player view.

    • onHowToButtonClick

      protected void onHowToButtonClick(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event) throws IOException
      Handles the click event on the "How to Play" button. This method loads the tutorial view.
      Parameters:
      event - The mouse event that triggered this method.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during loading the FXML file for the tutorial view.

    • onLogInButtonClick

      protected void onLogInButtonClick() throws IOException
      Handles the click event on the "Debug" button. This method loads the tutorial view.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during loading the FXML file for the tutorial view.

    • onDebugButtonClick

      protected void onDebugButtonClick() throws IOException
      Handles the click event on the "Debug" button. This method loads the login view
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during loading the FXML file for the login view.

    • onScoreboardButtonClick

      protected void onScoreboardButtonClick(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event) throws IOException
      Handles the click event on the "Scoreboard" button. This method loads the scoreboard view.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during loading the FXML file for the scoreboard view.

    • goToMainMenu

      protected void goToMainMenu()
      Handles the click event on the "Back" button. This method returns the user to the main menu.

    • onQuitButtonClick

      protected void onQuitButtonClick()
      Handles the click event on the "Quit" button. This method closes the app
